idea-plugin.name: DevRhythm
idea-plugin.vendor: Dr. John Edwards – Utah State University
idea-plugin.description:
DevRhythm — Understanding Coding Rhythm in Programming Courses

DevRhythm is a lightweight PyCharm/IntelliJ plugin developed for research on programmer activity rhythms and self-regulated learning behavior. It records coding and idle events to help analyze work–rest balance during programming sessions.

  • Tracks active vs idle time in real time
  • Logs data to a .devrhythm folder in each project
  • Displays a live status-bar indicator
  • Works on Windows, macOS, and Linux

Research Team

Developed by Rubash Mali, under the supervision of Dr. John Edwards at Utah State University.
